thread.title: VINCENT B
thread.title_full: Nebraska Furniture Mart reviewed by VINCENT B

author: VINCENT B
title: VINCENT B
text: Was checking out ranges the other day and found one for $939. Came back on MLK day and the price had suddenly risen, but it was on sale for $939! At least I got free delivery for the MLK special. Then there's the whole Price is Lower in Checkout ... mine was a whole $5 (on the $939 purchase).
